argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-re | |- Re = ( x e. CC |-> ( ( x + ( * ` x ) ) / 2 ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_reval | |- ( x e. CC -> ( Re ` x ) = ( ( x + ( * ` x ) ) / 2 ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_recl | |- ( x e. CC -> ( Re ` x ) e. RR ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( x e. CC -> ( ( x + ( * ` x ) ) / 2 ) e. RR ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_fmpti | |- Re : CC --> RR |
